text.section: If, after a hearing under § 15-315 of this subtitle, the Board finds that there are grounds for discipline under § 15-314(a) of this subtitle to suspend or revoke a license of a physician assistant or to deny a license to an applicant or to reprimand a licensed physician assistant, the Board may impose a fine subject to the Board's regulations instead of or in addition to suspending or revoking the license or reprimanding the licensee.
The Board shall pay any fines collected under this section into the General Fund of the State.
